tgt_original: 聖不依止於二法，　　久已摧折我慢幢，

src_original: dvayādvayavinirmukta nirālamba namo 'stu te // 22 //
tgt_original: 解脫二無二法門，　　無所緣尊今讚禮。

src_original: jitās te mānasā doṣāḥ śārīrāś ca caturvidhāḥ /
tgt_original: 所有身語意過失，　　大聖久已普除斷，

src_original: acintya vigataupamya nirālamba namo 'stu te // 23 //
tgt_original: 不可譬喻不可思，　　無所緣尊今讚禮。

src_original: sā tathāgatena yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhā yathaiva pūrvāt tathā paścāt tathā madhye /  pūrvāntato 'jātāparāntato 'saṃkrāntā madhyo viviktā /
tgt_original: 如其先法，後法亦然、中法亦然，前際不生、後際不去、中際性離，此如是法是即名為如所說句。

src_original: anābhogapravṛtto 'si sarvadoṣavivarjitaḥ /
tgt_original: 大聖無轉無發悟，　　一切過失悉遠離，

src_original: jñānapūrvaṅgamā ceṣtā nirālamba namo 'stu te // 24 //
tgt_original: 智為先導遍所行，　　無所緣尊今讚禮。

src_original: bodhir mañjuśrīr ākāśasamā /  ākāśaṃ ca na samaṃ na (JĀA 62)  viṣamaṃ bodhir api na samā na viṣamā /  tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提者與虛空等，謂以虛空無高、無下，菩提亦然無高、無下，由是如來成等正覺。

src_original: evam evaiṣāṃ yathāvatpadaṃ bhavati /  yathaikas tathā sarve,  yathā sarve tathā caikaḥ /
tgt_original: 如其一法，多法亦然； 如其多法，一法亦然。

src_original: na cātra mañjuśrīr ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ copalabhyate //
tgt_original: 妙吉祥！ 若一性若多性皆無所得，若有相、若無相，無入無住。

src_original: anākāra ucyate 'nupalambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām /
tgt_original: 言無相者，謂一切法無所得故。

src_original: ākāra ucyate 'navasthitasya cittasyāvasthānam /
tgt_original: 又相者，謂即心無所住分位；

src_original: anākāra ucyate (JĀA 63)  'nimittaḥ samādhir vimokṣamukham /
tgt_original: 無相者，即無相三摩地解脫法門。

src_original: ākāra ucyate cittanātulanāgaṇanāpratyavekṣāvimokṣaḥ sarvadharmāṇām /
tgt_original: 又相者，即一切法思惟稱量算數伺察；

src_original: anākāra ucyate tulāsamatikramaḥ /
tgt_original: 無相者，謂出過稱量。

src_original: katamaś ca tulāsamatikramaḥ /
tgt_original: 何名出過稱量？

src_original: ākāra ucyate saṃskṛtapratyavekṣā /
tgt_original: 又相者，即有為伺察；

src_original: anākāra ucyate 'saṃskṛtapratyavekṣā //
tgt_original: 無相者，即無為伺察。

src_original: T. 357 246c23-249a18, T. 358 252c12-26, T. 359(W) 261b16-261c10.  bodhir mañjuśrīr anāsravo 'nupādānatā /
tgt_original: 菩提者即是無漏無取。

src_original: tatra mañjuśrīḥ katamo 'nāsravaḥ katamānupādānatā /
tgt_original: 何名無漏？ 何名無取？

src_original: anāsravatā mañjuśrīr ucyate caturṇām āsravānāṃ vigamaḥ /
tgt_original: 無漏者，謂離四種有漏之法。

src_original: katameṣāṃ caturṇām,
tgt_original: 何等為四？

src_original: yaduta kāmāsravasya,  bhavāsravasya,  avidyāsravasya,  dṛṣṭvāsravasya ca,
tgt_original: 一者欲漏，二者有漏，三者無明漏，四者見漏。

src_original: eṣāṃ caturṇām āsravāṇām /  anupādānatocyate caturṇām upādānānāṃ vigamaḥ /
tgt_original: 無取者，謂離四種取著之法。

src_original: katameṣāṃ caturṇām /
tgt_original: 何等為四？

src_original: kāmopādānasya,  dṛṣṭyupādānasya,  śīlavrataparāmarśopādānasya,  ātmavādopādānasya ca,
tgt_original: 一者欲取，二者見取，三者戒禁取，四者我語取。

src_original: eṣāṃ caturṇām upādānānām /  sarvāṇy avidyayā andhīkṛtāni,  tṛṣṇayālālapitāni,  anyonyābhiniveśyopādīyante /
tgt_original: 如是四取，悉由無明暗蔽、愛法滋潤，互相取著。

src_original: tatra mañjuśrīs tathāgata ātmavādopādānamūlaparijñātāvī /  ātmaviśuddhyā sarvasattvaviśuddhim anugataḥ /  yā cātmaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvasattvaviśuddhiḥ /  yā sarvasattvaviśuddhir advaidhā advaidhīkārā /  (JĀA 65) yaś cādvayārthaḥ so 'nutpādānirodhaḥ /
tgt_original: 妙吉祥！ 若或本初於我語取根本，能了知者即我清淨，我清淨已隨知一切眾生清淨，由我清淨故即彼一切眾生清淨，若一切眾生清淨即法無二、無二種類，彼無二義即無生、無滅。
